name: Gump Demo
detailed_description:
2D perspective Platformer. Arcade.
its a retake on the classic Space shooter Arcade. 2.5D. it has Single And Co-op.

two playing modes.
Single/Co-op Player Linear Progression.
Single/Co-op Player Custom Map Section.

the linear Progression is a classical run through to the end level. where you fly unbounded forward. aud it has open Custom Section Characters and Levels.
its great if you want to just brush off the seriousness enjoy playing arcade space shooters. you can join in with your buddy and and finish the levels rather easily. once the custom mode opens you can choose your own enemies to dwell with and enjoy the 9 custom stages as many times as you want. the Maps are not redundant visually. if you don't like linear progression, you can enjoy the custom maps and make your own game. however this is the demo version and it only contains the minimals levels. To enjoy the game throughly, do Get the Full version.

its not a option heavy game. nor very serious mission to save the world campaign as well. the arms presented and the Players, you'd find are a bit different than the usual trends. if you enjoy a game to fly in a 2.5d space and drop some bombs on the head you may enjoy the game.

its about Doobie and his squandering miserably strange confrontation with the enemy of the third kind. all characters and players are therefore a bit strange.

short_description: join Doobie and his bogus journey of Gump. the land is more bizarre and so is he.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 1536 MB
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Texture heavy!
